Player History
Had 2000th career hit on 8/19/1982, off Cleveland Benson (CI)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1982, hitting .379 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Manchester on 2/12/1983 to a 3-year deal worth $7,000,000 per year...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1983, hitting .457 with 3 HR, 20 RBI...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Leftfield in 1983...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 4/18/1984...
